title: Four cheese and tomato pasta bake
ingredients: ['315g macaroni pasta', '1 (400g) tin peeled plum tomatoes, drained and chopped', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '205g grated Cheddar cheese', '170g grated mozzarella cheese', '60g freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '65g crumbled feta cheese']
